title: PsyMar the Generic Whatever
data:
*This page is a [Diary of a Crawler](/Category:Diary_of_a_Crawler "Category:Diary of a Crawler"), the journal of an individual character. This page probably contains spoilers.*

This is where [PsyMar](/index.php?title=User:PsyMar\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "User:PsyMar (page does not exist)")'s better/more instructive attempts at escaping with the Orb of Zot will go.

## Game 24 -- MiBe

Morgue file: [\[1\]](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/PsyMar/morgue-PsyMar-20100422-132828.txt)

### D:1

- T28: Found a ring mail. Spent 8 turns putting it on. AC up to 4!
- T104: First kill, a rat.
- T119: First sacrifice, a giant bat.
- T154: Axes to Level 4
- T3xx: Kobold almost took me out; killed it and rested.
- T424: a knobbly jade ring. I'll try it.
- T425: no obvious effect, but I'll keep it on in case it's some sort of awesome smiting ring.
- T576: Tried a THRE LOJ OSICK scroll (had 3). Nothing appeared to happen. Either charging or remove curse, then, or fear.
- T577: Tried ZIKOAL EZOHIO (had 2 by now). Identify! And my ring is a ring of life protection. Not too useful early game but no reason to take it off.
- T890: Done exploring.
- T927: Went downstairs.

### D:2

- Rat and Ijyb right away! Yikes! I back around a corner from Ijyb. Kill a rat while waiting and reach level 2. Ijyb shows up; after a few misses, I berserk.
- T955: Ijyb dead. Drops nothing. Bleah.
- T1134: After a fight with a goblin, giant bat, and kobold, acquire Trog's Hand ability. Also got to level 3 in there somewhere.
- T1148: Dodging to level 3!
- T1275: Pair of gauntlets on previous turn; I'll wear. Also got a glowing sling.
- T1278: ID'd sling as +2,+0, no other bonuses. "meh". Also, done exploring... but only found 2 staircases, so should come back.
- T1298: Went downstairs.

### D:3

- found... a disco hall? wtf?
- hit teleport trap, will have to find way back.
- T:1468: Found upstairs back to D:2.

### D:2 revisited

- Tried reading a scroll; it's Teleport.
- What the... Jessica AND sigmund?
- T:1622: Killed Jessica after berserking and killing sigmund.
- T:1740: Jessica dropped a (use-tested) +2 robe of magic resistance! Awesome!
- T:1741: And scroll of ID says Sigmund's scythe is of protection! Woot! Given I have only 5 AC without the scythe, I'll use it for a while.
- Went back down.

### D:3 part 2: Electric Boogaloo

- T:198x: found a second scroll of some type, forget which, it's fog though upon use.
- T:2020: With berserk, killed the ghost of Vesto the Skirmisher, a weakling DSCK of Lugonu.
- T:2069: Looked back at disco-ish area, found an altar. It's Xom. That explains a lot.
- T:2515: Found a Kiku altar.
- T:2774: Found one of my scrolls was detect curses (through use).
- T:2778: None of the glowing weapons I found have brands of awesomeness, so I'll stick with my protection scythe.
- T:2969: have explored all except part of Xom's disco hall.
- T:3028: Went downstairs.

### D:4

- T:3029: saved.
- T:3029: And I'm back!
- T:3046: Found a long ivory wand.
- T:3103: After zapping at a jackal twice with no effect, tried on myself, it's healing.
- T:3216: Found temple stairs.
- Went to temple, looked around a bit, came back.
- T:3296: Detected curses. Had an ego-elven short sword I hadn't tried out, it's vampiric.
- T:3301: Ate bread ration, wielded elven vampiric short sword.
- T:3375: Got poisoned by a giant ant. Tried wand of healing, which didn't cure the poison. Tried random potions, got poison first, but next was healing. Best ID of poison potion ever.
- T:3549: found a wand shop. Entered. Bought frost and enslavement wands.
- T:3639: Gained Brothers in Arms.
- T:40xx: Done exploring. Went down to D:5, swarmed by orcs, came back up and killed an ant that followed. Then went down via other stairs.

### D:5

- T:4094: fell through shaft to D:8. Going back up now\...

- T:4197: on D:6, found Blork the orc with a wand. Took two hits, couldn't have taken a third, escaped up stairs. Ran into orc horde, ran up stairs again, back to the stairs I went to D:5 via the second time.

- T:4549: After another orc horde battle, decided to switch to plate mail instead of the +2 MR robe. My vamp short sword is +3,+1.

- T:4729: Quaff-ID'd a potion of mutation. got:

  - Protected by bone plates (AC +2, Dex -1)
  - Flexible-but-weak muscles (Dex +1, Str -1)
  - Partially covered in metallic scales (AC +3, Dex -2)
  - Total: AC +5, Dex -2, Str -1, I'll take it!

- T:4783: Found an armor shop with two randarts! Particularly interesting is the +1 plate mail of the Amoeba (rN+ EV+2 Str+3). Need 950 gold, though, and have... 33. I'll come back later.

- T:4857: Have 6 of a scroll, so I try it, nothing happens. Probably remove curse then; I'll inscribe it.

- Done exploring.

### D:6

- Found stairs that didn't leave me back near blork. Did find an imp, and a couple wands that look interesting.
- T:5374: Found a dwarven cloak of darkness. Neato!
- T:5870: Killed Blork with wands.
- T:6034: Went downstairs.

### D:7 and 8

- Found an armor shop on D:7. Forget what else happened.
  - Said armor shop had a couple randarts, one good, but I couldn't afford anything.
- On D:8, found the entrance to the orcish mines; ran back up.

### D:9

- Found a centaur behind a bush; took it out with wand of fireball, then wand of frosted away the cloud of flame.
- took out imp, hungry ghost, and phantom, and found stairs to Lair; did not go down.
- Found stairs to Lair
- Finished exploring level, taking out stuff like a hippogriff in the process
- went to lair

### Lair

- Lured up some monster, killed it
- Went down, got surrounded by rats and a frog, went back up, read scroll of immolation killing all the rats, then killed the frog
- Saved on D:9, restored, rested, went back down
- Surrounded again, went up, killed them one at a time
- T:9337: went back down, lured up some blink frogs
- T:9382: used trog's hand, used brothers in arms, died.
- Final score: 3270, new personal best by far!

### Lessons learned

- Blink frogs are pretty buff
- Activate trog's hand and brothers in arms \*before\* entering lair, then berserk once you're there
- Turn off individual-weapons skills so as to train only fighting skill, since you don't know early on what weapons you'll be using the most

## Game 33 -- MiBe

Morgue file: [\[2\]](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/PsyMar/morgue-PsyMar-20100426-145040.txt)

### D:1-2

- Not much happened on D:1

- on D:2:

  - Identified potions of healing (had 2), berserk rage, agility, and invisibility
  - Identified scrolls of blinking, curse weapon, enchant weapon I, identify, random uselessness, and teleportation
  - Also have a scroll that was {tried on item} that I tried on armor, so that's recharging
  - scroll-ID'd a ring of poison resistance (yay!)
  - scroll-ID'd and wielded a +1,+0 dagger of distortion, which should be fun

### D:3

- The dagger of distortion is, indeed, fun
- quaff-ID'd restore abilities and poison (which didn't affect me per the resistance ring)
- read a scroll, nothing happened
- quaff-ID'd paralysis, nothing killed me, yay
- quaff-ID'd brilliance
- Space warps horribly around the orc wizard! and killed it! yay!
- Got, and turned off, stealth skill
- found Okawaru altar, but I'm with Trog, so not now thanks
- Got to level 5 by end of level, can now withstand the potential 43 damage from distortion unwield

### D:4

- Got my first banishment of an enemy, against a kobold. Kind of a waste...
- Found an ossuary, went in

### Ossuary

- Killed a bunch of zombies
- Had to berserk a few times
- killed two mummies, got two items cursed
- killed a ghost
- got 2 ID scrolls, 3-4 scrolls of teleport, and 2 potions of speed, and 2 potions of blood (ick).

### Back to D:4

- Quaff-ID'd a potion of mutation, got speckled scales (+1 AC), flexible-but-weak muscles (+1 dex, -1 str), and slow metabolism!
- scroll-ID'd the cursed +6,+6 hammer "Grevashre" {freeze, MR}
- Finished exploring, went down (still wielding distortion dagger since I can't uncurse the hammer)

### D:5

- Found a brass wand, which turned out to be draining, awesome
- Found a Yred altar
- Killed Edmund
- ID'd a randart armor (+0 leather armor "Trug", rC+ Dex-2 Acc+2)
- ID'd a flail as being +6,+2 flail of holy wrath
- wielded flail, was not banished or killed by distortion unwield, though I did get 'ported
- Found wand, it's digging! yay!
- found scroll shop, got ID scrolls and an immolation scroll (for when needed)

### D:6

- Fell down shaft to D:7 or D:8 (not sure which), was surrounded, went down stairs and port-blinked twice to get back up stairs to D:6
- was followed by a jelly; put on amulet of resist corrosion even though it was cursed, and killed the jelly
- ran into orc horde, while hungry; couldn't berserk and got pwned. DYWYPI?
- forgot about scrolls of blinking and teleport. Bleah.

## Game 35 -- MiBe

Game 35 morgue: [\[3\]](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/PsyMar/morgue-PsyMar-20100427-215030.txt)

### D:1

- Start in an entrance vault with several secret doors; searched to find them to improve traps\&doors skill.
- Got Axes skill to level 4, and turned off exp going to it, since I'll probably switch to another weapon soon enough.
- Such as this dagger of protection I found on T:694 from a kobold.
- T:826: got to level 2, gained short blades skill.
- Explored around stairs on D:2 a bit, then came back to D:1.
- My protection dagger is +2,+2.
- T:2310: finished exploring D:1.

### D:2

- T:2403: Test-ID'd identify, identified remove curse scroll.
- Identified an amulet as being faith. Put it on, because why not this early in the game?
- Finished exploring, T:2945.

### D:3

- ID'd a bunch of scrolls and potions, most notably enchant armor and enchant weapon I. Dagger is now +4,+2.
- Killed stuff and ate it.
- Finished exploring, T:3817.

### D:4

- Killed my first Ogre of the game.
- Found an inaccessible-without-digging TSO altar.
- Went downstairs around T:4600.

### D:5

- Suddenly, gnolls everywhere!
- Found a staircase to Temple, surrounded by translucent rock wall. Good thing I'm a Troggite anyway or I'd be pissed.
- Oh, hey, go go secret door. Not that I need it.

### D:6

- Stuff happpened.
- Killed Sigmund.
- Suddenly, orcs and jellies everywhere!
- Brothers in arms + teleport scroll + berserk and I got out of it while my two-headed ogre killed everything.
- Another TSO altar?

### D:7

- Stuff happened.

### D:8

- Landed in a fight
- Fought off orcs by luring upstairs
- Found orcish mines, and a neato general store
- entered orcish mines

### Orcish Mines

- Fought orcs (duh)
- Got a -4,-1 quick blade randart from Trog. Yeah, elec brand, but... really, Trog? I have TEN dex!
- Started wielding my +1,+1 great sword of holy wrath -- should've done that a long time ago.
- Got two levels deep before chickening out
- Did, however, take out a bunch of orcs and most of an ogre with a single scroll of immolation

### D:9

- All three stairs landed near mobs
- Cleared out most of said mobs
- Had a sick-and-4-HP-and-hungry incident; survived with 1 HP and a ring of regen
- after getting back to full HP, went back to D:9
- Got hungry, encountered a troll, tried to eat to berserk, killed by troll.

### Lessons learned

- Always eat immediately if hungry and fighting something nasty, so that you can then berserk. Don't wait until you're one hit from death, then eat.
- rings of regen are awesome
- Don't be afraid to try out scrolls when surroudned, you might get immolation or fear.

## Game 38 -- DEWz (summonings)

Morgue file: [\[4\]](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/PsyMar/morgue-PsyMar-20100429-204338.txt)

### D:1-4

- Not much notable aside from an ogre I took out with Mephitic Cloud and spammals.
- ID'd scrolls of blinking, curse armour/weapon, detect/remove curse, fear, fog, ID, magic mapping, noise, and teleportation.
- ID'd rings of evasion, life protection, and levitation.
- ID'd potions of gain intelligence/strength, Heal wounds, healing, invis, magic, and restore abilities.
- Got lots of missiles and stuff, a +2 cloak of MR, and a +2 leather armour. The ring of evasion I found is +3.

### D:5

- Took Nemelex Xobeh.
- Used up a deck of destruction on a zombie of some sort.
- Got surrounded by an imp, an orc horde, etc.
- Escaped using mephitic clouds and a teleport scroll and spammals.

### D:6

- Got a deck of summonings, used it to kill stuff.
- Finished exploring level and pwning stuff.
- Facing a jelly, drew from summonings deck, got "Famine". Whoops.
- Ate a chunk I had in inventory, drew again, got Repulsiveness, killed jelly.
- Jelly never hit me due to EV of 19 (and insane luck).

### D:7

- Found temple, not much else.

### D:8

- Got surrounded by nasty stuff.
- Ran out of MP.
- Blink-ported out of it with scrolls.
- Into a room with a scorpion and a centaur with frost darts.
- And I had no deck left either.
- Finally blinked again, behind a door.
- Closed door.
- Rested... with 1 HP, while poisoned. DYWYPI?
- Had 4 healing potions that I ignored.
- Fail. And I'd just found a book of wizardry, too.

## Game 40 -- DDNe

Game 40 morgue: <http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/PsyMar/morgue-PsyMar-20100503-142001.txt>

### D:1

- Started in a plants-and-butterflies vault, blocked in by a plant. Took about 250 turns to kill said plant with my fists.
- Pained a goblin to death, restored MP.
- Lather, rinse, repeat.
- Ack! Kobold with me out of MP! Hide around corner, regen MP. It never noticed me.
- Couple miscasts on a goblin; didn't wake it, so went back, regenned, killed it.
- ID'd detect curse, found my ring uncursed, wore it.
- Killed a kobold, got to level 2.
- Killed a rat, got Necromancy to level 5.
- Found a spear of reaching; wielded it for now.
- Wasted a lot of time meleeing a plant to get to an otherwise-inaccessible area... which held nothing.

### D:2

- Killed a giant bat, got from near starving back to hungry.
- Ran into three hobgoblins.
- Killed one, read a scroll of teleport which didn't take me far.
- Restored some MP to kill the second, then meleed the third.
- Used up one potion of heal wounds in there.
- Got surrounded and near starving, again.
- ran through chokepoint to upstairs, only taking one goblin with me.
- Killed it and ate it. yay survival. Restored MP, went back down.
- Lured a few more enemies up the stairs to kill them one by one.
- No longer hungry, yay.
- These stairs were near a forest; I predict Crazy Yiuf -- think I can take him.
- Was right. Barely. Had to zap healing wand at myself, and use the retreat-to-regen-mana strategy. Managed to use the stairs, though, so at least I could retreat towards the known.
- Went down another staircase to D:2.
- Tried reading scrolls against a newt; first was ID. Id'd my ring (see invis), then my other two unknown scrolls (enchant weapon I and fear.)
- Found a runed mace; determined it uncursed (via detect curse scroll); wielded it, because why not, it might be good.
- Quaff-ID'd paralysis. Nothing showed up, phew.
- Found a runed orcish hammer, picked it up.
- Quaff-ID'd berserk. Uh-oh.
- Good thing I had food.
- Ran into a snake that took 7 pains without dying. Killed it with my mace, and quaffed my second heal wounds.
- Killed a worm... with \*nine\* pains, and I have 7 MP. Fortunately it was fleeing when I ran out of MP so I could regen.
- Went down, finally, at T:35xx.

### D:3

- Found an orc. Killed it, but it shouted, so I took another stairs back down.
- Found a +2 pair of orcish gauntlets, yay!
- Discovered scroll of curse armor the hard way.
- Found the orc horde, including a wizard.
- Ran to upstairs, killed the wizard alone.
- Got to level 5. Time to learn vampiric draining.
- Done. Back to D:3...
- Oh crud, a ghost. Time to use crazy yiuf's qstaff, I guess.
- Ghost disappeared, no idea what happened to it. It fled, though, I think. Now to deal with gnolls...
- Ok, three down one to go thanks to vampiric draining and stairs to regen MP.
- Found the ghost again. Back to the qstaff, I guess.
- PsyMar the Reanimator (L5 DDNe) killed the ghost of nhawdge the Skirmisher, an average HOFi on turn 4914. (D:3)
- After that close encounter, was advised to learn dispel undead; did so.

### D:4

- Found a shiny ring mail.
- Found a scroll of remove curse; now I can try the shiny ring mail (which wasn't cursed, I detect cursed.)
- +1 ring mail, all spells still very good or better.
- Found a couple wands.
- First one: digging.
- Second one: Confusion. Nice.
- Took out a black bear and raided its honey.

### D:5

- Still going strong.
- Had to eat the honeycombs due to being near starving and nothing dropping corpses.
- Found a lava-y area surrounding a bunch of demons.
- Confused the strongest demon with my wand, got over 400 EXP!!!!
- Now, just must remember DO NOT TELEPORT ON THIS LEVEL.
- killed an orc priest, got to level 8.

### D:6

- Found Temple, went with Makhleb.
- Killed a centaur and got a bow of flame out of it.
- Killed Edmund on turn 8073 and got a ring mail of MR out of it. (+1 enchanted, too!)

### D:7

- Got encumbered.
- Went back to temple to stash stuff, particularly Crazy Yiuf's staff (don't want that falling in the wrong hands!)
- Got a flail of pain; as a necromancer, this is awesome.
- Found a kobold storm near an upstaircase in a corridor.
- ???
- Profit!
- Ack, one big kobold had a dagger of freakin' distortion.
- Killed it; keeping the dagger for emergencies.
- Reached level 9.

### D:8

- Not much happened here.
- found an altar of zin, with an angel behind translucent rock wall. Left it alone.
- Reached XL 10 for the first time in any game.
- Cleared the level; went down.
- I have never been to D:10, so... this'll be a test.

### D:9

- Got a couple more wands from a vault.
- Found Maurice already killed by a flame cloud.
- Got a cloak of poison resistance from where maurice was, then hauled out of there.
- Found the +3,+5 scythe "Finisher" (weapon) {speed, Str+3} and started using it.

### D:10

- First time to D:10!
- Found the orcish mines entrance.
- Cleared level, hauled some junk back to Temple so that it wouldn't get picked up by monsters, came back.
- Took out a two-headed ogre -- \*barely\*.
- Went to D:11 in search of lair.

### D:11

- Cleared out a beehive with tons of honeycombs and two royal jellies (not the monster kind).
- Found a spellbook of air; memorized mephitic cloud, and shock (so I could train for casting mephitic cloud).
- Found and killed sonja; got to XL11.
- Killed a cyclops, yay.

### D:12

- Took out a bunch of stuff
- Found a vault/zig/something; will need 8 potions of resistance to get in (after paying 120 gold to the imp)
- Found a fire drake guarding the Lair (surrounded by plants); took it out
- entered the lair, came out, killed an iguana

### Lair:1

- Not too much notable here, aside from a bunch of shops, which gave me, among other things:

  - the quarterstaff "Beefita" {venom, Hunger rPois rC+ rN+ EV+4}
    - Still wielding my +5,+2 flail of pain, though
  - the ring "Teuc Nue" {EV+5 Dex-3 Int+2 SInv}
  - IDs for amulet of inaccuracy, ring of hunger and scroll of weapon
  - 2 ID scrolls and 2 scrolls of enchant weapon II
  - A cursed -4 ring mail randart with -3 to str (They can't all be winners, kid)

- Found 2 unknown potions that turned out to be mutation upon quaff; after two quaffs, I have herbivore 1 and +10% MP. Not a bad tradeoff.

### Lair:2

- Found and entered a labyrinth.

- Got to the center quick enough, and took out the minotaur with meph cloud. Loot included:

  - Cursed splint mail with other nasty stuff, which I left in the lab
  - the ring "Ghewkuix" {rF+ rC+ SInv Stlth+}
  - An amulet I am wearing which is either clarity, conservation, resist corrosion, resist mutation, or warding (The others would either ID, give me abilities, or I've already ID'd them, or be stasis -- and I can teleport with it on)

- Thanks to spamming shock, mephitic cloud is now at "fair".

### Lair:3

- Oooh, watery level.
- Lots of yaks and rats and a few electric eels.
- Found staircase to shoals; went down and up just to say I'd been there.
- Also found a bottled efreet, which I stashed on lair:2.
- Found a staff of wizardry, also stashed on lair:2 (this DDNe likes to melee a bit with pain brand.)

### Lair:4

- Found a cruddy weapons shop.
- Found and cleared an anthell vault.
- Found an altar of TSO. Pfft.
- Also found some shallow water with various monsters in it. Need to learn more autoexplore exclusions kthx.
- Cleared level

### Lair:5

- Found entrance to swamp.
- Learned how to use exclusions.
- Killed some stuff, including a hippogriff followed (barely) by a hydra.
- Found the blowgun of Offence {speed, rF+ rC+, was cursed}
- Found an ID scroll; my long-unID'd ring was a ring of fire.
- Sang some Frank Sinatra.
- Killed a black mamba. Insert Kobe Bryant joke here.
- Found a spellbook of Wizardry.

### Lair:6

- Fought my first death yak. Then a few more.
- Man, those things are tough.
- I'd better go back and do orc.

### Orc:1

- Killed some orcs.
- Saw only two downstairs.
- Went down to Orc:2, killed an ogre, came up, found Harold.
- Harold hit a teleport trap.
- He went to the other half of Orc:1.
- Killed Harold.

### Orc:2

- Encountered Joseph upon going downstairs.
- Went upstairs, took other downstairs.
- Dug back to first area, so I'd have a line of retreat.
- Killed lots of orcs.
- Found an Okawaru altar.
- Killed Eustachio.

### Orc:3

- Found a staircase to the Elven Halls.
- Found Nessos, and a horde of orcs, and an ogre -- yay for mephitic cloud. Killed all.
- Found Jozef, killed him.
- Saw Orc:4, saw orc knights and stuff, decided to finish lair instead.

### Lair:6-7

- Not much happened.
- Death yak horde fell to Mephitic Cloud.

### Lair:8

- Vastly underestimated an 8-headed hydra.
- Died. 49381 points is still by far my high score, however.
html:
PsyMar the Generic Whatever

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
This page is a Diary of a Crawler, the journal of an individual character. This page probably contains spoilers.

This is where PsyMar's better/more instructive attempts at escaping with the Orb of Zot will go.

Contents

    • 5.13 Lair:1
    • 5.14 Lair:2
    • 5.15 Lair:3
    • 5.16 Lair:4
    • 5.17 Lair:5
    • 5.18 Lair:6
    • 5.19 Orc:1
    • 5.20 Orc:2
    • 5.21 Orc:3
    • 5.22 Lair:6-7
    • 5.23 Lair:8

Game 24 -- MiBe

Morgue file: [1]

D:1

  • T28: Found a ring mail. Spent 8 turns putting it on. AC up to 4!
  • T104: First kill, a rat.
  • T119: First sacrifice, a giant bat.
  • T154: Axes to Level 4
  • T3xx: Kobold almost took me out; killed it and rested.
  • T424: a knobbly jade ring. I'll try it.
  • T425: no obvious effect, but I'll keep it on in case it's some sort of awesome smiting ring.
  • T576: Tried a THRE LOJ OSICK scroll (had 3). Nothing appeared to happen. Either charging or remove curse, then, or fear.
  • T577: Tried ZIKOAL EZOHIO (had 2 by now). Identify! And my ring is a ring of life protection. Not too useful early game but no reason to take it off.
  • T890: Done exploring.
  • T927: Went downstairs.

D:2

  • Rat and Ijyb right away! Yikes! I back around a corner from Ijyb. Kill a rat while waiting and reach level 2. Ijyb shows up; after a few misses, I berserk.
  • T955: Ijyb dead. Drops nothing. Bleah.
  • T1134: After a fight with a goblin, giant bat, and kobold, acquire Trog's Hand ability. Also got to level 3 in there somewhere.
  • T1148: Dodging to level 3!
  • T1275: Pair of gauntlets on previous turn; I'll wear. Also got a glowing sling.
  • T1278: ID'd sling as +2,+0, no other bonuses. "meh". Also, done exploring... but only found 2 staircases, so should come back.
  • T1298: Went downstairs.

D:3

  • found... a disco hall? wtf?
  • hit teleport trap, will have to find way back.
  • T:1468: Found upstairs back to D:2.

D:2 revisited

  • Tried reading a scroll; it's Teleport.
  • What the... Jessica AND sigmund?
  • T:1622: Killed Jessica after berserking and killing sigmund.
  • T:1740: Jessica dropped a (use-tested) +2 robe of magic resistance! Awesome!
  • T:1741: And scroll of ID says Sigmund's scythe is of protection! Woot! Given I have only 5 AC without the scythe, I'll use it for a while.
  • Went back down.

D:3 part 2: Electric Boogaloo

  • T:198x: found a second scroll of some type, forget which, it's fog though upon use.
  • T:2020: With berserk, killed the ghost of Vesto the Skirmisher, a weakling DSCK of Lugonu.
  • T:2069: Looked back at disco-ish area, found an altar. It's Xom. That explains a lot.
  • T:2515: Found a Kiku altar.
  • T:2774: Found one of my scrolls was detect curses (through use).
  • T:2778: None of the glowing weapons I found have brands of awesomeness, so I'll stick with my protection scythe.
  • T:2969: have explored all except part of Xom's disco hall.
  • T:3028: Went downstairs.

D:4

  • T:3029: saved.
  • T:3029: And I'm back!
  • T:3046: Found a long ivory wand.
  • T:3103: After zapping at a jackal twice with no effect, tried on myself, it's healing.
  • T:3216: Found temple stairs.
  • Went to temple, looked around a bit, came back.
  • T:3296: Detected curses. Had an ego-elven short sword I hadn't tried out, it's vampiric.
  • T:3301: Ate bread ration, wielded elven vampiric short sword.
  • T:3375: Got poisoned by a giant ant. Tried wand of healing, which didn't cure the poison. Tried random potions, got poison first, but next was healing. Best ID of poison potion ever.
  • T:3549: found a wand shop. Entered. Bought frost and enslavement wands.
  • T:3639: Gained Brothers in Arms.
  • T:40xx: Done exploring. Went down to D:5, swarmed by orcs, came back up and killed an ant that followed. Then went down via other stairs.

D:5

  • T:4094: fell through shaft to D:8. Going back up now...
  • T:4197: on D:6, found Blork the orc with a wand. Took two hits, couldn't have taken a third, escaped up stairs. Ran into orc horde, ran up stairs again, back to the stairs I went to D:5 via the second time.
  • T:4549: After another orc horde battle, decided to switch to plate mail instead of the +2 MR robe. My vamp short sword is +3,+1.
  • T:4729: Quaff-ID'd a potion of mutation. got:
    • Protected by bone plates (AC +2, Dex -1)
    • Flexible-but-weak muscles (Dex +1, Str -1)
    • Partially covered in metallic scales (AC +3, Dex -2)
    • Total: AC +5, Dex -2, Str -1, I'll take it!
  • T:4783: Found an armor shop with two randarts! Particularly interesting is the +1 plate mail of the Amoeba (rN+ EV+2 Str+3). Need 950 gold, though, and have... 33. I'll come back later.
  • T:4857: Have 6 of a scroll, so I try it, nothing happens. Probably remove curse then; I'll inscribe it.
  • Done exploring.

D:6

  • Found stairs that didn't leave me back near blork. Did find an imp, and a couple wands that look interesting.
  • T:5374: Found a dwarven cloak of darkness. Neato!
  • T:5870: Killed Blork with wands.
  • T:6034: Went downstairs.

D:7 and 8

  • Found an armor shop on D:7. Forget what else happened.
    • Said armor shop had a couple randarts, one good, but I couldn't afford anything.
  • On D:8, found the entrance to the orcish mines; ran back up.

D:9

  • Found a centaur behind a bush; took it out with wand of fireball, then wand of frosted away the cloud of flame.
  • took out imp, hungry ghost, and phantom, and found stairs to Lair; did not go down.
  • Found stairs to Lair
  • Finished exploring level, taking out stuff like a hippogriff in the process
  • went to lair

Lair

  • Lured up some monster, killed it
  • Went down, got surrounded by rats and a frog, went back up, read scroll of immolation killing all the rats, then killed the frog
  • Saved on D:9, restored, rested, went back down
  • Surrounded again, went up, killed them one at a time
  • T:9337: went back down, lured up some blink frogs
  • T:9382: used trog's hand, used brothers in arms, died.
  • Final score: 3270, new personal best by far!

Lessons learned

  • Blink frogs are pretty buff
  • Activate trog's hand and brothers in arms *before* entering lair, then berserk once you're there
  • Turn off individual-weapons skills so as to train only fighting skill, since you don't know early on what weapons you'll be using the most


Game 33 -- MiBe

Morgue file: [2]

D:1-2

  • Not much happened on D:1
  • on D:2:
    • Identified potions of healing (had 2), berserk rage, agility, and invisibility
    • Identified scrolls of blinking, curse weapon, enchant weapon I, identify, random uselessness, and teleportation
    • Also have a scroll that was {tried on item} that I tried on armor, so that's recharging
    • scroll-ID'd a ring of poison resistance (yay!)
    • scroll-ID'd and wielded a +1,+0 dagger of distortion, which should be fun

D:3

  • The dagger of distortion is, indeed, fun
  • quaff-ID'd restore abilities and poison (which didn't affect me per the resistance ring)
  • read a scroll, nothing happened
  • quaff-ID'd paralysis, nothing killed me, yay
  • quaff-ID'd brilliance
  • Space warps horribly around the orc wizard! and killed it! yay!
  • Got, and turned off, stealth skill
  • found Okawaru altar, but I'm with Trog, so not now thanks
  • Got to level 5 by end of level, can now withstand the potential 43 damage from distortion unwield

D:4

  • Got my first banishment of an enemy, against a kobold. Kind of a waste...
  • Found an ossuary, went in

Ossuary

  • Killed a bunch of zombies
  • Had to berserk a few times
  • killed two mummies, got two items cursed
  • killed a ghost
  • got 2 ID scrolls, 3-4 scrolls of teleport, and 2 potions of speed, and 2 potions of blood (ick).

Back to D:4

  • Quaff-ID'd a potion of mutation, got speckled scales (+1 AC), flexible-but-weak muscles (+1 dex, -1 str), and slow metabolism!
  • scroll-ID'd the cursed +6,+6 hammer "Grevashre" {freeze, MR}
  • Finished exploring, went down (still wielding distortion dagger since I can't uncurse the hammer)

D:5

  • Found a brass wand, which turned out to be draining, awesome
  • Found a Yred altar
  • Killed Edmund
  • ID'd a randart armor (+0 leather armor "Trug", rC+ Dex-2 Acc+2)
  • ID'd a flail as being +6,+2 flail of holy wrath
  • wielded flail, was not banished or killed by distortion unwield, though I did get 'ported
  • Found wand, it's digging! yay!
  • found scroll shop, got ID scrolls and an immolation scroll (for when needed)

D:6

  • Fell down shaft to D:7 or D:8 (not sure which), was surrounded, went down stairs and port-blinked twice to get back up stairs to D:6
  • was followed by a jelly; put on amulet of resist corrosion even though it was cursed, and killed the jelly
  • ran into orc horde, while hungry; couldn't berserk and got pwned. DYWYPI?
  • forgot about scrolls of blinking and teleport. Bleah.

Game 35 -- MiBe

Game 35 morgue: [3]

D:1

  • Start in an entrance vault with several secret doors; searched to find them to improve traps&doors skill.
  • Got Axes skill to level 4, and turned off exp going to it, since I'll probably switch to another weapon soon enough.
  • Such as this dagger of protection I found on T:694 from a kobold.
  • T:826: got to level 2, gained short blades skill.
  • Explored around stairs on D:2 a bit, then came back to D:1.
  • My protection dagger is +2,+2.
  • T:2310: finished exploring D:1.

D:2

  • T:2403: Test-ID'd identify, identified remove curse scroll.
  • Identified an amulet as being faith. Put it on, because why not this early in the game?
  • Finished exploring, T:2945.

D:3

  • ID'd a bunch of scrolls and potions, most notably enchant armor and enchant weapon I. Dagger is now +4,+2.
  • Killed stuff and ate it.
  • Finished exploring, T:3817.

D:4

  • Killed my first Ogre of the game.
  • Found an inaccessible-without-digging TSO altar.
  • Went downstairs around T:4600.

D:5

  • Suddenly, gnolls everywhere!
  • Found a staircase to Temple, surrounded by translucent rock wall. Good thing I'm a Troggite anyway or I'd be pissed.
  • Oh, hey, go go secret door. Not that I need it.

D:6

  • Stuff happpened.
  • Killed Sigmund.
  • Suddenly, orcs and jellies everywhere!
  • Brothers in arms + teleport scroll + berserk and I got out of it while my two-headed ogre killed everything.
  • Another TSO altar?

D:7

  • Stuff happened.

D:8

  • Landed in a fight
  • Fought off orcs by luring upstairs
  • Found orcish mines, and a neato general store
  • entered orcish mines

Orcish Mines

  • Fought orcs (duh)
  • Got a -4,-1 quick blade randart from Trog. Yeah, elec brand, but... really, Trog? I have TEN dex!
  • Started wielding my +1,+1 great sword of holy wrath -- should've done that a long time ago.
  • Got two levels deep before chickening out
  • Did, however, take out a bunch of orcs and most of an ogre with a single scroll of immolation

D:9

  • All three stairs landed near mobs
  • Cleared out most of said mobs
  • Had a sick-and-4-HP-and-hungry incident; survived with 1 HP and a ring of regen
  • after getting back to full HP, went back to D:9
  • Got hungry, encountered a troll, tried to eat to berserk, killed by troll.

Lessons learned

  • Always eat immediately if hungry and fighting something nasty, so that you can then berserk. Don't wait until you're one hit from death, then eat.
  • rings of regen are awesome
  • Don't be afraid to try out scrolls when surroudned, you might get immolation or fear.

Game 38 -- DEWz (summonings)

Morgue file: [4]

D:1-4

  • Not much notable aside from an ogre I took out with Mephitic Cloud and spammals.
  • ID'd scrolls of blinking, curse armour/weapon, detect/remove curse, fear, fog, ID, magic mapping, noise, and teleportation.
  • ID'd rings of evasion, life protection, and levitation.
  • ID'd potions of gain intelligence/strength, Heal wounds, healing, invis, magic, and restore abilities.
  • Got lots of missiles and stuff, a +2 cloak of MR, and a +2 leather armour. The ring of evasion I found is +3.

D:5

  • Took Nemelex Xobeh.
  • Used up a deck of destruction on a zombie of some sort.
  • Got surrounded by an imp, an orc horde, etc.
  • Escaped using mephitic clouds and a teleport scroll and spammals.

D:6

  • Got a deck of summonings, used it to kill stuff.
  • Finished exploring level and pwning stuff.
  • Facing a jelly, drew from summonings deck, got "Famine". Whoops.
  • Ate a chunk I had in inventory, drew again, got Repulsiveness, killed jelly.
  • Jelly never hit me due to EV of 19 (and insane luck).

D:7

  • Found temple, not much else.

D:8

  • Got surrounded by nasty stuff.
  • Ran out of MP.
  • Blink-ported out of it with scrolls.
  • Into a room with a scorpion and a centaur with frost darts.
  • And I had no deck left either.
  • Finally blinked again, behind a door.
  • Closed door.
  • Rested... with 1 HP, while poisoned. DYWYPI?
  • Had 4 healing potions that I ignored.
  • Fail. And I'd just found a book of wizardry, too.

Game 40 -- DDNe

Game 40 morgue: http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/PsyMar/morgue-PsyMar-20100503-142001.txt

D:1

  • Started in a plants-and-butterflies vault, blocked in by a plant. Took about 250 turns to kill said plant with my fists.
  • Pained a goblin to death, restored MP.
  • Lather, rinse, repeat.
  • Ack! Kobold with me out of MP! Hide around corner, regen MP. It never noticed me.
  • Couple miscasts on a goblin; didn't wake it, so went back, regenned, killed it.
  • ID'd detect curse, found my ring uncursed, wore it.
  • Killed a kobold, got to level 2.
  • Killed a rat, got Necromancy to level 5.
  • Found a spear of reaching; wielded it for now.
  • Wasted a lot of time meleeing a plant to get to an otherwise-inaccessible area... which held nothing.

D:2

  • Killed a giant bat, got from near starving back to hungry.
  • Ran into three hobgoblins.
  • Killed one, read a scroll of teleport which didn't take me far.
  • Restored some MP to kill the second, then meleed the third.
  • Used up one potion of heal wounds in there.
  • Got surrounded and near starving, again.
  • ran through chokepoint to upstairs, only taking one goblin with me.
  • Killed it and ate it. yay survival. Restored MP, went back down.
  • Lured a few more enemies up the stairs to kill them one by one.
  • No longer hungry, yay.
  • These stairs were near a forest; I predict Crazy Yiuf -- think I can take him.
  • Was right. Barely. Had to zap healing wand at myself, and use the retreat-to-regen-mana strategy. Managed to use the stairs, though, so at least I could retreat towards the known.
  • Went down another staircase to D:2.
  • Tried reading scrolls against a newt; first was ID. Id'd my ring (see invis), then my other two unknown scrolls (enchant weapon I and fear.)
  • Found a runed mace; determined it uncursed (via detect curse scroll); wielded it, because why not, it might be good.
  • Quaff-ID'd paralysis. Nothing showed up, phew.
  • Found a runed orcish hammer, picked it up.
  • Quaff-ID'd berserk. Uh-oh.
  • Good thing I had food.
  • Ran into a snake that took 7 pains without dying. Killed it with my mace, and quaffed my second heal wounds.
  • Killed a worm... with *nine* pains, and I have 7 MP. Fortunately it was fleeing when I ran out of MP so I could regen.
  • Went down, finally, at T:35xx.

D:3

  • Found an orc. Killed it, but it shouted, so I took another stairs back down.
  • Found a +2 pair of orcish gauntlets, yay!
  • Discovered scroll of curse armor the hard way.
  • Found the orc horde, including a wizard.
  • Ran to upstairs, killed the wizard alone.
  • Got to level 5. Time to learn vampiric draining.
  • Done. Back to D:3...
  • Oh crud, a ghost. Time to use crazy yiuf's qstaff, I guess.
  • Ghost disappeared, no idea what happened to it. It fled, though, I think. Now to deal with gnolls...
  • Ok, three down one to go thanks to vampiric draining and stairs to regen MP.
  • Found the ghost again. Back to the qstaff, I guess.
  • PsyMar the Reanimator (L5 DDNe) killed the ghost of nhawdge the Skirmisher, an average HOFi on turn 4914. (D:3)
  • After that close encounter, was advised to learn dispel undead; did so.

D:4

  • Found a shiny ring mail.
  • Found a scroll of remove curse; now I can try the shiny ring mail (which wasn't cursed, I detect cursed.)
  • +1 ring mail, all spells still very good or better.
  • Found a couple wands.
  • First one: digging.
  • Second one: Confusion. Nice.
  • Took out a black bear and raided its honey.

D:5

  • Still going strong.
  • Had to eat the honeycombs due to being near starving and nothing dropping corpses.
  • Found a lava-y area surrounding a bunch of demons.
  • Confused the strongest demon with my wand, got over 400 EXP!!!!
  • Now, just must remember DO NOT TELEPORT ON THIS LEVEL.
  • killed an orc priest, got to level 8.

D:6

  • Found Temple, went with Makhleb.
  • Killed a centaur and got a bow of flame out of it.
  • Killed Edmund on turn 8073 and got a ring mail of MR out of it. (+1 enchanted, too!)

D:7

  • Got encumbered.
  • Went back to temple to stash stuff, particularly Crazy Yiuf's staff (don't want that falling in the wrong hands!)
  • Got a flail of pain; as a necromancer, this is awesome.
  • Found a kobold storm near an upstaircase in a corridor.
  • ???
  • Profit!
  • Ack, one big kobold had a dagger of freakin' distortion.
  • Killed it; keeping the dagger for emergencies.
  • Reached level 9.

D:8

  • Not much happened here.
  • found an altar of zin, with an angel behind translucent rock wall. Left it alone.
  • Reached XL 10 for the first time in any game.
  • Cleared the level; went down.
  • I have never been to D:10, so... this'll be a test.

D:9

  • Got a couple more wands from a vault.
  • Found Maurice already killed by a flame cloud.
  • Got a cloak of poison resistance from where maurice was, then hauled out of there.
  • Found the +3,+5 scythe "Finisher" (weapon) {speed, Str+3} and started using it.

D:10

  • First time to D:10!
  • Found the orcish mines entrance.
  • Cleared level, hauled some junk back to Temple so that it wouldn't get picked up by monsters, came back.
  • Took out a two-headed ogre -- *barely*.
  • Went to D:11 in search of lair.

D:11

  • Cleared out a beehive with tons of honeycombs and two royal jellies (not the monster kind).
  • Found a spellbook of air; memorized mephitic cloud, and shock (so I could train for casting mephitic cloud).
  • Found and killed sonja; got to XL11.
  • Killed a cyclops, yay.

D:12

  • Took out a bunch of stuff
  • Found a vault/zig/something; will need 8 potions of resistance to get in (after paying 120 gold to the imp)
  • Found a fire drake guarding the Lair (surrounded by plants); took it out
  • entered the lair, came out, killed an iguana

Lair:1

  • Not too much notable here, aside from a bunch of shops, which gave me, among other things:
    • the quarterstaff "Beefita" {venom, Hunger rPois rC+ rN+ EV+4}
      • Still wielding my +5,+2 flail of pain, though
    • the ring "Teuc Nue" {EV+5 Dex-3 Int+2 SInv}
    • IDs for amulet of inaccuracy, ring of hunger and scroll of weapon
    • 2 ID scrolls and 2 scrolls of enchant weapon II
    • A cursed -4 ring mail randart with -3 to str (They can't all be winners, kid)
  • Found 2 unknown potions that turned out to be mutation upon quaff; after two quaffs, I have herbivore 1 and +10% MP. Not a bad tradeoff.

Lair:2

  • Found and entered a labyrinth.
  • Got to the center quick enough, and took out the minotaur with meph cloud. Loot included:
    • Cursed splint mail with other nasty stuff, which I left in the lab
    • the ring "Ghewkuix" {rF+ rC+ SInv Stlth+}
    • An amulet I am wearing which is either clarity, conservation, resist corrosion, resist mutation, or warding (The others would either ID, give me abilities, or I've already ID'd them, or be stasis -- and I can teleport with it on)
  • Thanks to spamming shock, mephitic cloud is now at "fair".

Lair:3

  • Oooh, watery level.
  • Lots of yaks and rats and a few electric eels.
  • Found staircase to shoals; went down and up just to say I'd been there.
  • Also found a bottled efreet, which I stashed on lair:2.
  • Found a staff of wizardry, also stashed on lair:2 (this DDNe likes to melee a bit with pain brand.)

Lair:4

  • Found a cruddy weapons shop.
  • Found and cleared an anthell vault.
  • Found an altar of TSO. Pfft.
  • Also found some shallow water with various monsters in it. Need to learn more autoexplore exclusions kthx.
  • Cleared level

Lair:5

  • Found entrance to swamp.
  • Learned how to use exclusions.
  • Killed some stuff, including a hippogriff followed (barely) by a hydra.
  • Found the blowgun of Offence {speed, rF+ rC+, was cursed}
  • Found an ID scroll; my long-unID'd ring was a ring of fire.
  • Sang some Frank Sinatra.
  • Killed a black mamba. Insert Kobe Bryant joke here.
  • Found a spellbook of Wizardry.

Lair:6

  • Fought my first death yak. Then a few more.
  • Man, those things are tough.
  • I'd better go back and do orc.

Orc:1

  • Killed some orcs.
  • Saw only two downstairs.
  • Went down to Orc:2, killed an ogre, came up, found Harold.
  • Harold hit a teleport trap.
  • He went to the other half of Orc:1.
  • Killed Harold.

Orc:2

  • Encountered Joseph upon going downstairs.
  • Went upstairs, took other downstairs.
  • Dug back to first area, so I'd have a line of retreat.
  • Killed lots of orcs.
  • Found an Okawaru altar.
  • Killed Eustachio.

Orc:3

  • Found a staircase to the Elven Halls.
  • Found Nessos, and a horde of orcs, and an ogre -- yay for mephitic cloud. Killed all.
  • Found Jozef, killed him.
  • Saw Orc:4, saw orc knights and stuff, decided to finish lair instead.

Lair:6-7

  • Not much happened.
  • Death yak horde fell to Mephitic Cloud.

Lair:8

  • Vastly underestimated an 8-headed hydra.
  • Died. 49381 points is still by far my high score, however.

This is where [[User:PsyMar|PsyMar]]'s better/more instructive attempts at escaping with the Orb of Zot will go.

==Game 24 -- MiBe==
Morgue file: [http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/PsyMar/morgue-PsyMar-20100422-132828.txt]

* T927: Went downstairs.

* T:1741: And scroll of ID says Sigmund's scythe is of protection! Woot!  Given I have only 5 AC without the scythe, I'll use it for a while.
* Went back down.
===D:3 part 2: Electric Boogaloo===

* T:2778: None of the glowing weapons I found have brands of awesomeness, so I'll stick with my protection scythe.
* T:2969: have explored all except part of Xom's disco hall.
* T:3028: Went downstairs.
===D:4===
* T:3029: saved.

* T:3046: Found a long ivory wand.
* T:3103: After zapping at a jackal twice with no effect, tried on myself, it's healing.
* T:3216: Found temple stairs.
* Went to temple, looked around a bit, came back.
* T:3296: Detected curses.  Had an ego-elven short sword I hadn't tried out, it's vampiric.
* T:3301: Ate bread ration, wielded elven vampiric short sword.
* T:3375: Got poisoned by a giant ant.  Tried wand of healing, which didn't cure the poison.  Tried random potions, got poison first, but next was healing.  Best ID of poison potion ever.
* T:3549: found a wand shop.  Entered. Bought frost and enslavement wands.
* T:3639: Gained Brothers in Arms.
* T:40xx: Done exploring.  Went down to D:5, swarmed by orcs, came back up and killed an ant that followed.  Then went down via other stairs.
===D:5===
* T:4094: fell through shaft to D:8.  Going back up now...
* T:4197: on D:6, found Blork the orc with a wand.  Took two hits, couldn't have taken a third, escaped up stairs.  Ran into orc horde, ran up stairs again, back to the stairs I went to D:5 via the second time.
* T:4549: After another orc horde battle, decided to switch to plate mail instead of the +2 MR robe.  My vamp short sword is +3,+1.
* T:4729: Quaff-ID'd a potion of mutation.  got:
** Protected by bone plates (AC +2, Dex -1)
** Flexible-but-weak muscles (Dex +1, Str -1)
** Partially covered in metallic scales (AC +3, Dex -2)
** Total: AC +5, Dex -2, Str -1, I'll take it!
* T:4783: Found an armor shop with two randarts! Particularly interesting is the +1 plate mail of the Amoeba (rN+ EV+2 Str+3).  Need 950 gold, though, and have... 33.  I'll come back later.
* T:4857: Have 6 of a scroll, so I try it, nothing happens. Probably remove curse then; I'll inscribe it.
* Done exploring.
===D:6===
* Found stairs that didn't leave me back near blork.  Did find an imp, and a couple wands that look interesting.
* T:5374: Found a dwarven cloak of darkness.  Neato!

* T:6034: Went downstairs.
===D:7 and 8===
* Found an armor shop on D:7. Forget what else happened.
** Said armor shop had a couple randarts, one good, but I couldn't afford anything.
* On D:8, found the entrance to the orcish mines; ran back up.
===D:9===
* Found a centaur behind a bush; took it out with wand of fireball, then wand of frosted away the cloud of flame.
* took out imp, hungry ghost, and phantom, and found stairs to Lair; did not go down.
* Found stairs to Lair
* Finished exploring level, taking out stuff like a hippogriff in the process
* went to lair
===Lair===
*Lured up some monster, killed it
*Went down, got surrounded by rats and a frog, went back up, read scroll of immolation killing all the rats, then killed the frog
*Saved on D:9, restored, rested, went back down
*Surrounded again, went up, killed them one at a time
*T:9337: went back down, lured up some blink frogs
*T:9382: used trog's hand, used brothers in arms, died.
*Final score: 3270, new personal best by far!
===Lessons learned===
*Blink frogs are pretty buff
*Activate trog's hand and brothers in arms *before* entering lair, then berserk once you're there
*Turn off individual-weapons skills so as to train only fighting skill, since you don't know early on what weapons you'll be using the most
